inclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status of 0, 1 or 2.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have normal organ function as regards LFTs and RFTs
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Previous history of breast cancer diagnosis or treatment
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Hypercalcemia, defined as serum level >11 mg/dl.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Abnormal laboratory data for: AST (SGOT), ALT (SGPT), Serum Bilirubin, Alkaline phosphatase, Creatinine and/or Creatinine clearance, and Albumin.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Female patients who are pregnant or breast feeding.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 42 year-old postmenopausal woman with newly diagnosed invasive breast carcinoma. She has normal organ function and no previous history of breast cancer diagnosis or treatment.
